snippet: The transfer is the first in nearly three months, and it reduces the inmate population to 154, part of an ongoing effort to close the facility.
abstract: Military announces it has repatriated Algerian detainee Ahmed Bin Saleh Bel Bacha, who has been held without trial for 12 years at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.
lead_paragraph: The transfer is the first in nearly three months, and it reduces the inmate population to 154, part of an ongoing effort to close the facility.

headline.main: Military Repatriates Algerian Detainee From Guantánamo Bay
headline.print_headline: Military Repatriates Algerian Held for Years at Guantánamo
